properties.displayName: Suspicious File Downloaded From File-Sharing Website Via Certutil.EXE
properties.description:
Detects the execution of certutil with certain flags that allow the utility to download files from file-sharing websites.
Source URL: https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_certutil_download_file_sharing_domains.yml
Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Date Modified: 2023-08-17
Status: experimental
References: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-server/administration/windows-commands/certutil, https://forensicitguy.github.io/agenttesla-vba-certutil-download/, https://news.sophos.com/en-us/2021/04/13/compromised-exchange-server-hosting-cryptojacker-targeting-other-exchange-servers/, https://twitter.com/egre55/status/1087685529016193025, https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Certutil/
False Positives: Unknown
properties.query:
_Im_ProcessCreate
| where ((TargetProcessName endswith "\\certutil.exe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "CertUtil.exe") and (TargetProcessCommandLine contains "urlcache " or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "verifyctl ") and (TargetProcessCommandLine contains ".githubusercontent.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "anonfiles.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "cdn.discordapp.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "ddns.net" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "dl.dropboxusercontent.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "ghostbin.co" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "gofile.io" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "hastebin.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "mediafire.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "mega.nz" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "paste.ee" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "pastebin.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "pastebin.pl" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "pastetext.net" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "privatlab.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "privatlab.net" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "send.exploit.in" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "sendspace.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "storage.googleapis.com" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "storjshare.io" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "temp.sh" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "transfer.sh" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "ufile.io"))
